description: Notification indicates the beginning of alarm synchronization.
Notification carries the query result of alarm synchronization.

Summary.eval: ($v8 ne '') ? '$v8' : 'Query result of alarm synchronization notification detected'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundEventSynchronizationQueryResultNotify HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundNEName s EXAMPLE HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundNEType s EXAMPLE HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundObjectInstance s EXAMPLE HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundEventType s EXAMPLE HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundEventTime s EXAMPLE HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundProbableCause s EXAMPLE HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundSeverity s EXAMPLE HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundEventDetail s EXAMPLE HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundAdditionalInfo s EXAMPLE HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundFaultFlag s EXAMPLE HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundFaultFunction s EXAMPLE HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundDeviceIP a 192.0.2.1 HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundSerialNo i 9999 HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundProbableRepair s EXAMPLE HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundResourceIDs s EXAMPLE HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundsAdditionalVB1 s EXAMPLE HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundsAdditionalVB2 s EXAMPLE HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundsAdditionalVB3 s EXAMPLE HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundsAdditionalVB4 s EXAMPLE HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundsAdditionalVB5 s EXAMPLE HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundsAdditionalVB6 s EXAMPLE HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundsAdditionalVB7 s EXAMPLE HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundsAdditionalVB8 s EXAMPLE HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundEventName s EXAMPLE

description: Instance of element,such as number of Rack, Frame, Slot, Subslot, Port and so on,string(255)
variables.name: HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundObjectInstance

description: Reason of Probable caused alarm, string(64)
variables.name: HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundProbableCause

description: Alarm ID and detail information, format: ID+detail infomation, string(255)
variables.name: HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundEventDetail

description: Additional infomation of device, such as Country, City and so on, string(255)
variables.name: HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundAdditionalInfo

description: The flag of the fault.Show whether the alarm is an event ,a fault alarm or a recovery alarm.
variables.name: HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundFaultFlag

description: The function type of the alarm.It can be one of these values:'Power','Environment','Signal','Relay','Hardware','Software','Run','Communication','Service','Processerror','UNKNOWN_FUC_TYPE'
variables.name: HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundFaultFunction

description: The IP address of the device
variables.name: HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundDeviceIP

description: The probable repair advice of the alarm.
variables.name: HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundProbableRepair

description: Notification indicates the end of alarm synchronization.
It shows the result of alarm synchronization.
1 means the alarm synchronization successfully ended.
2 means the alarm synchronization is stopped by the NMS's command.
3 means some error occured during the alarm synchronization.
variables.name: HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundEventSynchronizationEndStatus

description: The detail description of the alarm synchronization end status.
variables.name: HW-IMAPV1NORTHBOUND-TRAP-MIB::hwNmNorthboundEventSynchronizationEndStatusDetail
